compatibility.notes: The Pixar license is permissive and allows for both static and dynamic linking with compatible licenses. Care should be taken when combining with copyleft licenses.

key_requirements: Retain the copyright notice and license in all copies or substantial portions of the Work.
Provide attribution to the original authors of the Work.
Include any notices provided with the Work.
license.name: Pixar
obligations: Include a copy of the license in all distributions of the Work.
Include a copyright notice in all copies or substantial portions of the Work.
State changes made to the Work when distributing modified versions.
